amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $4 million from the Office of the Chief Administrative Officer to Members' Representational Allowances to promote the use of computers and other electronic technologies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in House Rept. 104-663, to transfer $4 million in funds appropriated for the Chief Administrative Officer to Members' Representational Allowance, to allow Members to seek alternative commercial providers for technological services provided by the Chief Administrative Officer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fazio amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
